fields.desc: The aboleth can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: If destroyed, the aboleth gains a new body in 5d10 days, reviving with all its Hit Points in the Far Realm or another location chosen by the DM.
fields.name: Eldritch Restoration

fields.desc: If the aboleth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by mucus. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the aboleth at the end of the aboleth's turn. Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target's skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can't regain Hit Points unless it is underwater. While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes 6 (1d12) Acid damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.
fields.name: Mucus Cloud

fields.desc: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.
fields.name: Probing Telepathy

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, Difficult Terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.
fields.name: Ice Walk

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: The elemental can enter a creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.
fields.name: Air Form

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, Difficult Terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.
fields.name: Ice Walk

fields.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: The ankheg can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.
fields.name: Tunneler

fields.desc: The archelon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The archmage has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Evasion

fields.desc: At the end of each of the azer's turns, each creature of the azer's choice in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the azer takes 5 (1d10) Fire damage unless the azer has the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Fire Aura

fields.desc: The azer sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.
fields.name: Illumination

fields.desc: The baboon has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: The balor explodes when it dies. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 20, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the balor. Failure: 31 (9d6) Fire damage plus 31 (9d6) Force damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: If the balor dies outside the Abyss, it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.
fields.name: Death Throes

fields.desc: At the end of each of the balor's turns, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the balor takes 13 (3d8) Fire damage.
fields.name: Fire Aura

fields.desc: If the balor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

fields.desc: The balor has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: At the start of each of its turns, the devil deals 5 (1d10) Piercing damage to any creature it is grappling or any creature grappling it.
fields.name: Barbed Hide

fields.desc: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.
fields.name: Diabolical Restoration

fields.desc: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: While Bloodied, the berserker has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.
fields.name: Bloodied Frenzy

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.
fields.name: Amorphous

fields.desc: A creature that hits the pudding with a melee attack roll takes 4 (1d8) Acid damage. Nonmagical ammunition is destroyed immediately after hitting the pudding and dealing any damage. Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative -1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the pudding and coming into contact with it. The weapon is destroyed if the penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the Mending spell on the weapon. In 1 minute, the pudding can eat through 2 feet of nonmagical wood or metal.
fields.name: Corrosive Form

fields.desc: The pudding can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The hawk has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hawk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: While Bloodied, the boar has Advantage on attack rolls.
fields.name: Bloodied Fury

fields.desc: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.
fields.name: Diabolical Restoration

fields.desc: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The bugbear needn't spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.
fields.name: Abduct

fields.desc: The bugbear needn't spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.
fields.name: Abduct

fields.desc: The cat's jump distance is determined using its Dexterity rather than its Strength.
fields.name: Jumper

fields.desc: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.
fields.name: Diabolical Restoration

fields.desc: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The chuul can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of itself. This trait otherwise works like the Detect Magic spell but isn't itself magical.
fields.name: Sense Magic

fields.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to Acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Acid damage dealt.
fields.name: Acid Absorption

fields.desc: Whenever the golem starts its turn Bloodied, roll 1d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to be berserk until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied.
fields.name: Berserk

fields.desc: The golem can't shape-shift.
fields.name: Immutable Form

fields.desc: The golem has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: While in Bright Light, the cloaker has Disadvantage on attack rolls.
fields.name: Light Sensitivity

fields.desc: The commoner has proficiency in one skill of the DM's choice and has Advantage whenever it makes an ability check using that skill.
fields.name: Training

fields.desc: The couatl's thoughts can't be read by any means, and other creatures can communicate with it telepathically only if it allows them.
fields.name: Shielded Mind

fields.desc: The crab can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The crocodile can hold its breath for 1 hour.
fields.name: Hold Breath

fields.desc: The deer doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it moves out of an enemy's reach.
fields.name: Agile

fields.desc: If the deva dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.
fields.name: Exalted Restoration

fields.desc: The deva has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The wolf has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: If the djinni dies outside the Elemental Plane of Air, its body dissolves into mist, and it gains a new body in 1d4 days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Air.
fields.name: Elemental Restoration

fields.desc: The djinni has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The djinni has a 30 percent chance of knowing the Wish spell. If the djinni knows it, the djinni can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the djinni can understand. If the djinni casts the spell for the creature, the djinni suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the djinni has cast it three times, the djinni can't do so again for 365 days.
fields.name: Wishes

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: While in sunlight, the drider has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.
fields.name: Sunlight Sensitivity

fields.desc: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the drider knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
fields.name: Web Walker

fields.desc: The dryad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The dryad can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.
fields.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants

fields.desc: The mephit explodes when it dies. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 10, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the mephit. Failure: 5 (2d4) Bludgeoning damage. Success: Half damage.
fields.name: Death Burst

fields.desc: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.
fields.name: Earth Glide

fields.desc: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.
fields.name: Siege Monster

fields.desc: If the efreeti dies outside the Elemental Plane of Fire, its body dissolves into ash, and it gains a new body in 1d4 days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Fire.
fields.name: Elemental Restoration

fields.desc: The efreeti has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The efreeti has a 30 percent chance of knowing the Wish spell. If the efreeti knows it, the efreeti can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the efreeti can understand. If the efreeti casts the spell for the creature, the efreeti suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the efreeti has cast it three times, the efreeti can't do so again for 365 days.
fields.name: Wishes

fields.desc: If the erinyes dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.
fields.name: Diabolical Restoration

fields.desc: The erinyes has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The erinyes has a magic rope. While bearing it, the erinyes can use the Entangling Rope action. The rope has AC 20, HP 90, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. The rope turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points, if it is 5+ feet away from the erinyes for 1 hour or more, or if the erinyes dies. If the rope is damaged or destroyed, the erinyes can fully restore it when finishing a Short Rest|XPHB|Short or Long Rest.
fields.name: Magic Rope

fields.desc: The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the ettercap knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
fields.name: Web Walker

fields.desc: At the end of each of the elemental's turns, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the elemental takes 5 (1d10) Fire damage. Creatures and flammable objects in the Emanation start Hitazard burning.
fields.name: Fire Aura

fields.desc: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so, and it can enter a creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) Fire damage.
fields.name: Fire Form

fields.desc: The elemental sheds Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.
fields.name: Illumination

fields.desc: The elemental takes 3 (1d6) Cold damage for every 5 feet the elemental moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.
fields.name: Water Susceptibility

fields.desc: If the golem takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.
fields.name: Aversion to Fire

fields.desc: Whenever the golem starts its turn Bloodied, roll 1d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object. Once the golem goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied. The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by taking an action to make a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check; the golem must be able to hear its creator. If this check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk until the start of its next turn, at which point it resumes rolling for the Berserk trait again if it is still Bloodied.
fields.name: Berserk

fields.desc: The golem can't shape-shift.
fields.name: Immutable Form

fields.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.
fields.name: Lightning Absorption

fields.desc: The golem has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The snake doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
fields.name: Flyby

fields.desc: The frog can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The frog's Long Jump is up to 10 feet and its High Jump is up to 5 feet with or without a running start.
fields.name: Standing Leap

fields.desc: The gargoyle doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
fields.name: Flyby

fields.desc: The cube fills its entire space and is transparent. Other creatures can enter that space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has Disadvantage on the saving throw. Creatures inside the cube have Cover|XPHB|Total Cover, and the cube can hold one Large creature or up to four Medium or Small creatures inside itself at a time. As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the cube can pull a creature or an object out of the cube by succeeding on a DC 12 Strength (Athletics) check, and the puller takes 10 (3d6) Acid damage.
fields.name: Ooze Cube

fields.desc: Even when the cube is in plain sight, a creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to notice the cube if the creature hasn't witnessed the cube move or otherwise act.
fields.name: Transparent

fields.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10, any creature that starts its turn in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the ghast. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to this ghast's Stench for 24 hours.
fields.name: Stench

fields.desc: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane.
fields.name: Ethereal Sight

fields.desc: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
fields.name: Incorporeal Movement

fields.desc: The boar has Advantage on melee attack rolls while it is Bloodied.
fields.name: Bloodied Fury

fields.desc: The crab can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The crocodile can hold its breath for 1 hour.
fields.name: Hold Breath

fields.desc: The beetle sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.
fields.name: Illumination

fields.desc: The frog can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The frog's Long Jump is up to 20 feet and its High Jump is up to 10 feet with or without a running start.
fields.name: Standing Leap

fields.desc: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The octopus can breathe only underwater. It can hold its breath for 1 hour outside water.
fields.name: Water Breathing

fields.desc: The owl doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
fields.name: Flyby

fields.desc: The rat has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: The seahorse can breathe only underwater.
fields.name: Water Breathing

fields.desc: The shark can breathe only underwater.
fields.name: Water Breathing

fields.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and it knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
fields.name: Web Walker

fields.desc: The toad can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The toad's Long Jump is up to 20 feet and its High Jump is up to 10 feet with or without a running start.
fields.name: Standing Leap

fields.desc: The vulture has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: The wasp doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
fields.name: Flyby

fields.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The ground in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the mouther is Difficult Terrain.
fields.name: Aberrant Ground

fields.desc: The mouther babbles incoherently while it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 10, any creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther while it is babbling. Failure: The target rolls 1d8 to determine what it does during the current turn: - 1-4: The target does nothing. - 5-6: The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction. - 7-8: The target makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.
fields.name: Gibbering

fields.desc: If the glabrezu dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.
fields.name: Demonic Restoration

fields.desc: The glabrezu has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.
fields.name: Amorphous

fields.desc: Nonmagical ammunition is destroyed immediately after hitting the ooze and dealing any damage. Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative -1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the ooze and coming into contact with it. The weapon is destroyed if the penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the Mending spell on the weapon. The ooze can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal or wood in 1 round.
fields.name: Corrosive Form

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The hag can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations only with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.
fields.name: Mimicry

fields.desc: If the naga dies, it returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its Hit Points unless Dispel Evil and Good is cast on its remains.
fields.name: Celestial Restoration

fields.desc: The half-dragon is related to a type of dragon associated with one of the following damage types (DM's choice): Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. This choice affects other aspects of the stat block.
fields.name: Draconic Origin

fields.desc: The hound has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: If the hezrou dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.
fields.name: Demonic Restoration

fields.desc: The hezrou has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, any creature that starts its turn in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the hezrou. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition until the start of its next turn.
fields.name: Stench

fields.desc: The hippogriff doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
fields.name: Flyby

fields.desc: The hippopotamus can hold its breath for 10 minutes.
fields.name: Hold Breath

fields.desc: While in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the hobgoblin, the hobgoblin and its allies have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the hobgoblin doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Aura of Authority

fields.desc: The hobgoblin has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hobgoblin's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, the two of them can communicate telepathically with each other.
fields.name: Telepathic Bond

fields.desc: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.
fields.name: Diabolical Restoration

fields.desc: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The shark can breathe only underwater.
fields.name: Water Breathing

fields.desc: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.
fields.name: Hold Breath

fields.desc: The hydra has five heads. Whenever the hydra takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The hydra dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the hydra grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 20 Hit Points when it grows new heads.
fields.name: Multiple Heads

fields.desc: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra Reaction that can be used only for Opportunity Attacks.
fields.name: Reactive Heads

fields.desc: The hyena has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.
fields.name: Diabolical Restoration

fields.desc: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The mephit explodes when it dies. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the mephit. Failure: 5 (2d4) Cold damage. Success: Half damage.
fields.name: Death Burst

fields.desc: The imp has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: When the incubus finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into a Succubus, using that stat block instead of this one. Any equipment it's wearing or carrying isn't transformed.
fields.name: Succubus Form

fields.desc: The stalker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.
fields.name: Air Form

fields.desc: The stalker has the Invisible condition.
fields.name: Invisibility

fields.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to Fire damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Fire damage dealt.
fields.name: Fire Absorption

fields.desc: The golem can't shape-shift.
fields.name: Immutable Form

fields.desc: The golem has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The whale can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
fields.name: Hold Breath

fields.desc: The kobold has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.
fields.name: Sunlight Sensitivity

fields.desc: The kraken can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: If the kraken fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.
fields.name: Siege Monster

fields.desc: If the lemure dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points in 1d10 days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a Bless spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.
fields.name: Hellish Restoration

fields.desc: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: If destroyed, the lich reforms in 1d10 days if it has a spirit jar, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the lich's lair.
fields.name: Spirit Jar

fields.desc: The lion has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can Long Jump up to 25 feet.
fields.name: Running Leap

fields.desc: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The mephit explodes when it dies. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 11, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the mephit. Failure: 7 (2d6) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.
fields.name: Death Burst

fields.desc: The magmin explodes when it dies. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 11, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the magmin. Failure: 7 (2d6) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.
fields.name: Death Burst

fields.desc: If the marilith dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.
fields.name: Demonic Restoration

fields.desc: The marilith has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The marilith can take one Reaction on every turn of combat.
fields.name: Reactive

fields.desc: The merfolk can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The merrow can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have Disadvantage.
fields.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)

fields.desc: The mule counts as one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.
fields.name: Beast of Burden

fields.desc: If the mummy fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: The mummy has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: If destroyed, the mummy gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the mummy's lair. The heart is a Tiny object that has AC 17, HP 10, and Immunity to all damage except Fire.
fields.name: Undead Restoration

fields.desc: If the nalfeshnee dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.
fields.name: Demonic Restoration

fields.desc: The nalfeshnee has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The hag has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The hag has a soul bag. While holding or carrying the bag, the hag can use its Nightmare Haunting action. The bag has AC 15, HP 20, and Resistance to all damage. The bag turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the bag is destroyed, any souls the bag is holding are released. The hag can create a new bag after 7 days.
fields.name: Soul Bag

fields.desc: The nightmare can grant Resistance to Fire damage to a rider while it is on the nightmare.
fields.name: Confer Fire Resistance

fields.desc: The nightmare sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.
fields.name: Illumination

fields.desc: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.
fields.name: Amorphous

fields.desc: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.
fields.name: Undead Fortitude

fields.desc: The oni regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.
fields.name: Regeneration

fields.desc: The owl doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
fields.name: Flyby

fields.desc: The spider can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane while on the Material Plane and vice versa.
fields.name: Ethereal Sight

fields.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the spider knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
fields.name: Web Walker

fields.desc: The piranha can breathe only underwater.
fields.name: Water Breathing

fields.desc: If the pit fiend dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.
fields.name: Diabolical Restoration

fields.desc: The pit fiend emanates an aura in a 20-foot Emanation while it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 21, any enemy that starts its turn in the aura. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to this pit fiend's aura for 24 hours.
fields.name: Fear Aura

fields.desc: If the pit fiend fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)

fields.desc: The pit fiend has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.
fields.name: Divine Awareness

fields.desc: If the planetar dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.
fields.name: Exalted Restoration

fields.desc: The planetar has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.
fields.name: Hold Breath

fields.desc: The pseudodragon has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The pteranodon doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
fields.name: Flyby

fields.desc: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.
fields.name: Tunneler

fields.desc: The quasit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: If the rakshasa dies outside the Nine Hells, its body turns to ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.
fields.name: Fiendish Restoration

fields.desc: The rakshasa automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and the attack rolls of spells automatically miss it. Without the rakshasa's permission, no spell can observe the rakshasa remotely or detect its thoughts, creature type, or alignment.
fields.name: Greater Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The rat doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it moves out of an enemy's reach.
fields.name: Agile

fields.desc: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a whisper or chitter. A hearer can discern the sounds are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.
fields.name: Mimicry

fields.desc: The shark has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: The shark can breathe only underwater.
fields.name: Water Breathing

fields.desc: At the end of each of the remorhaz's turns, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the remorhaz takes 16 (3d10) Fire damage.
fields.name: Heat Aura

fields.desc: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The rust monster can pinpoint the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of itself.
fields.name: Iron Scent

fields.desc: With a 10-foot running start, the tiger can Long Jump up to 25 feet.
fields.name: Running Leap

fields.desc: The sahuagin has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Hit Points.
fields.name: Blood Frenzy

fields.desc: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it must be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating outside water.
fields.name: Limited Amphibiousness

fields.desc: The sahuagin can magically control sharks within 120 feet of itself, using a special telepathy.
fields.name: Shark Telepathy

fields.desc: At the end of each of the salamander's turns, each creature of the salamander's choice in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the salamander takes 7 (2d6) Fire damage.
fields.name: Fire Aura

fields.desc: The satyr has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The hag can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 11, any Beast or Humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can see the hag's true form. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to this hag's Vile Appearance for 24 hours.
fields.name: Vile Appearance

fields.desc: The seahorse can breathe only underwater.
fields.name: Water Breathing

fields.desc: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.
fields.name: Amorphous

fields.desc: While in sunlight, the shadow has Disadvantage on D20 Test.
fields.name: Sunlight Weakness

fields.desc: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.
fields.name: Lightning Absorption

fields.desc: The guardian is magically bound to an amulet. While the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (round up) is transferred to the guardian.
fields.name: Bound

fields.desc: The guardian regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.
fields.name: Regeneration

fields.desc: A spellcaster who wears the guardian's amulet can cause the guardian to store one spell of level 4 or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the guardian while within 5 feet of it. The spell has no effect but is stored within the guardian. Any previously stored spell is lost when a new spell is stored. The guardian can cast the spell stored with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no spell components and using the caster's spellcasting ability. The stored spell is then lost.
fields.name: Spell Storing

fields.desc: The solar knows if it hears a lie.
fields.name: Divine Awareness

fields.desc: If the solar dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.
fields.name: Exalted Restoration

fields.desc: If the solar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)

fields.desc: The solar has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
fields.name: Incorporeal Movement

fields.desc: While in sunlight, the specter has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.
fields.name: Sunlight Sensitivity

fields.desc: No magic can observe the sphinx remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.
fields.name: Inscrutable

fields.desc: If the sphinx fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: No magic can observe the sphinx remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.
fields.name: Inscrutable

fields.desc: If the sphinx fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: The sphinx has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the spider knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
fields.name: Web Walker

fields.desc: If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its Hit Points. Only a Wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.
fields.name: Fiendish Restoration

fields.desc: Attack rolls against the mephit are made with Disadvantage unless the mephit has the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Blurred Form

fields.desc: The mephit explodes when it dies. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 10, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the mephit. Failure: 5 (2d4) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.
fields.name: Death Burst

fields.desc: The golem can't shape-shift.
fields.name: Immutable Form

fields.desc: The golem has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The giant can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: When the succubus finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into an Incubus, using that stat block instead of this one.
fields.name: Incubus Form

fields.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.
fields.name: Swarm

fields.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.
fields.name: Swarm

fields.desc: If the swarm has a Climb Speed, the swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.
fields.name: Swarm

fields.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny piranha. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.
fields.name: Swarm

fields.desc: The swarm can breathe only underwater.
fields.name: Water Breathing

fields.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.
fields.name: Swarm

fields.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny raven. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.
fields.name: Swarm

fields.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.
fields.name: Swarm

fields.desc: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)

fields.desc: The tarrasque has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: If the tarrasque is targeted by a Magic Missile spell or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll 1d6. On a 1-5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected and reflects the spell, turning the caster into the target.
fields.name: Reflective Carapace

fields.desc: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.
fields.name: Siege Monster

fields.desc: The tough has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the tough's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: The tough has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the tough's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.
fields.name: Siege Monster

fields.desc: The limb regains 5 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the limb takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn't function on the limb's next turn. The limb dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.
fields.name: Regeneration

fields.desc: The limb uncannily has the same senses as a whole troll. If the limb isn't destroyed within 24 hours, roll 1d12. On a 12, the limb turns into a Troll. Otherwise, the limb withers away.
fields.name: Troll Spawn

fields.desc: If the troll ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the troll's limbs is severed, falls into the troll's space, and becomes a Troll Limb. The limb acts immediately after the troll's turn. The troll has 1 Exhaustion level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.
fields.name: Loathsome Limbs (4/Day)

fields.desc: The troll regains 15 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn't function on the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.
fields.name: Regeneration

fields.desc: If the unicorn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

fields.desc: The unicorn has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: While the familiar and its vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with the familiar telepathically, and the vampire can perceive through the familiar's senses.
fields.name: Vampiric Connection

fields.desc: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The vampire has these weaknesses: - Forbiddance: The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant. - Running Water: The vampire takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water. - Stake to the Heart: The vampire is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire has the Incapacitated condition. - Sunlight: The vampire takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
fields.name: Vampire Weakness

fields.desc: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
fields.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)

fields.desc: If the vampire drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the vampire uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can't use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed. While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can't return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the Paralyzed condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.
fields.name: Misty Escape

fields.desc: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
fields.name: Spider Climb

fields.desc: The vampire has these weaknesses: - Forbiddance: The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant. - Running Water: The vampire takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water. - Stake to the Heart: If a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire has the Incapacitated condition in its resting place, the vampire has the Paralyzed condition until the weapon is removed. - Sunlight: The vampire takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
fields.name: Vampire Weakness

fields.desc: If the vrock dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.
fields.name: Demonic Restoration

fields.desc: The vrock has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
fields.name: Magic Resistance

fields.desc: The vulture has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: The warrior has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: If the elemental takes Cold damage, its Speed decreases by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.
fields.name: Freeze

fields.desc: The elemental can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.
fields.name: Water Form

fields.desc: The werewolf has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the werewolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, Difficult Terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.
fields.name: Ice Walk

fields.desc: While in sunlight, the wight has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.
fields.name: Sunlight Sensitivity

fields.desc: The wisp can't wear or carry anything.
fields.name: Ephemeral

fields.desc: The wisp sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet.
fields.name: Illumination

fields.desc: The wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
fields.name: Incorporeal Movement

fields.desc: The wolf has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: The wolf has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
fields.name: Pack Tactics

fields.desc: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
fields.name: Incorporeal Movement

fields.desc: While in sunlight, the wraith has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.
fields.name: Sunlight Sensitivity

fields.desc: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.
fields.name: Earth Glide

fields.desc: The xorn can pinpoint the location of precious metals and stones within 60 feet of itself.
fields.name: Treasure Sense

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.
fields.name: Amphibious

fields.desc: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, Difficult Terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.
fields.name: Ice Walk

fields.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.
fields.name: Undead Fortitude
